description:
Travel efficiently along groomed trails, through valley basins and across rolling terrain. These snowshoes combine steel edges to bite into the snow with a durable, flexible plastic deck. Extra rigidity built into the nose can handle your strong kicksteps into the slope if you hit a steep section.

  • ExoTract™ deck has steel around the perimeter for traction, and plastic as the deck material for flexibility and great performance in the cold
  • Paraglide™ binding has stretch mesh to hold the foot securely without pressure points
  • Binding straps are easy to use, even when wearing gloves
  • Accepts MSR 5in. modular tails to add additional flotation for heavier loads and less supportive snow
name: MSR Revo Trail Snowshoes - Unisex
